thread.title: WPP chief executive Martin Sorrell quits

title: WPP chief executive Martin Sorrell quits
text:
WPP chief executive Martin Sorrell quits Sunday, April 15, 2018 - 01:12 
The chief executive of the world's biggest advertising firm, WPP, quit on Saturday (April 14) following an allegation of personal misconduct. David Doyle reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The chief executive of the world's biggest advertising firm, WPP, quit on Saturday (April 14) following an allegation of personal misconduct. David Doyle reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HE0yXC
